name: Arctic Trucker Simulator
description: Arctic Trucker Simulator – officially endorsed by Alex Debogorski – takes you down the world's iciest and most dangerous roads!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Dualcore, AMD X2 Dualcore with 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 4870, Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
